content: DelReact is a powerful agent-based task planning framework built on LangChain LangGraph, designed for reliable multi-step AI task automation with dynamic replanning capabilities.
The ReactAgentBuilder provides multi-provider LLM support with configurable agent workflows, supporting Gemini, OpenAI, Anthropic, and OpenRouter providers.
SubgraphBuilder enables context-safe execution with method chaining for complex agent workflows, allowing custom agent composition and conditional routing.
The RAG tool supports knowledge ingestion from JSON files, PDF documents, and bulk loading with optional OpenAI embeddings for semantic search capabilities.
